channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Grid Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Grid Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2024-1658|2024-03-18T19:05:48.360Z -- Unknown -- Grid Shortcodes
item.description: The Grid Shortcodes WordPress plugin before 1.1.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
